entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 10:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets this morning and then to 40 percent chance of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
